title: SOUTH BY NORTH: BOOK FOUR OF THE HUNTER/KILLER SERIES
description: Commander John Morrison is the most successful submarine commander in history. He commands the most important, and most secret asset, in the WWII US Navy, the USS San Francisco, SSN-711. Under his command, the San Francisco destroyed the Nazi scourge in the North Atlantic.His new find a way to the Pacific to spearhead the Allies response to the Japanese submarine sub launched missile attacks on the US west coast. The those missiles destroyed the Panama Canal. Nimitz needs him in theatre yesterday.He must do what no one has done before, make a winter transit under the Arctic ice. Only his nuclear submarine can do the job. But success always comes with a price.
author: M L MAKI
